## AddContentReturn.paste() method

A simplistic implementation of pasting content into the editor. Underneath it calls the paste handler `transformPaste` and that is all.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
paste(content: TaggedProsemirrorNode | string): AddContentReturn<GExtension>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  content | <code>TaggedProsemirrorNode &#124; string</code> | The text or node to paste into the document at the current selection. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`AddContentReturn<GExtension>`
